title: Darth Maul

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: Lie in wait at another player's house. You will attack the first registered visitor.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Can perform the factional Sith kill
- Has private chat with the other Sith.
- Conversion Immune

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Eliminate those that do not submit to the Dark Side

desc:
Post 609
*"Fear attracts the fearful... the strong... the weak... the innocent... the corrupt. Fear is my ally."*
